node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #48 宗個案患者的父親，沒有外遊史。患者於新年期間與第 #48 及 #49 宗個案患者接觸。據報指他居於田灣邨田澤樓，現於瑪麗醫院留醫，情況穩定。
node.detail_en: The patient is the father of patient no. 48 and allegedly lives in Tin Chak House of Tin Wan Estate. He has no history of (recent) travel. He had contacts with patients no. 48 (his daughter) and no. 49 (his son-in-law) during the Lunar New Year. He is receiving treatment at Queen Mary Hospital and is in a stable condition.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有居於 A07 室住戶先後確診，懷疑病毒經損毀的排污渠管系統傳播。衞生署一度撤離大廈 A07 室住戶接受隔離。食環署消毒涉及單位及房署檢查單位喉管後，居民獲安排返回居所。
groups.description_en: Some residents of the flats A07 across various floors of Hong Mei House (C H Estate, Tsing Yi) were diagnosed, hence leading to to suspicion of sewer leakage. Over a hundred residents of flats A07 were transferred to quarantine centre(s?). Residents were allowed to return home after FEHD sterilized the flats in question and confirmed that the sewer system is intact.

node.location_en: Tin Chak House, Tin Wan Estate
node.remarks_zh: 患者於新年期間與女兒（第 48 宗患者）見面，2 月 3 日起出現病徵
node.remarks_en: The patient met his daughter (patient no. 48) during Chinese New Year and started to show symptoms on Feb 3
